game.name: Cthulhu pub
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In Cthulhu pub, you can build your own pub or restaurant. Create cute characters, creepy monsters and establish a small cute pub or make a large castle with monsters, humans, and ancient Gods.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Cthulhu pub, you can build your own pub or restaurant. Create cute characters, creepy monsters and establish a small cute pub or make a large castle with monsters, humans, and ancient Gods.
